name: Super Bunny Game!!
description:
Super Bunny Game is a 2D platformer which features a bunny.

A Bunny's carrots have been stolen! Now she must defeat everything which stands in her path if she is to retrieve them.

-5 different levels for the Bunny to traverse.

-Meet other bunnies along the way.

-Fight all kinds of silly bosses that only a bunny would face.

-Three different weapons to end your foes lives with.

-The occasional branching path which leads to a secret.

-Around 30 minutes of gameplay.
